data.name: 0000 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, coming to the staff room was good and all, but...

data.name: 0001 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How do we actually go about getting the key to the music room?

data.name: 0002 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We need to give a legitimate reason if we want to borrow it after all.

data.name: 0003 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In the first place, I don't even know who I'm supposed to ask it from.

data.name: 0004 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon? Is something wrong?

data.name: 0005 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A-ah, yeah. Do you know how to go about borrowing the music room key?

data.name: 0006 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I wonder if we need some kind of application form.

data.name: 0007 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: If it's the key you want, then take a look.

data.name: 0008 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Heh?

data.name: 0009 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I've already borrowed it, you know?

data.name: 0010 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Eh, you don't need any documentation or anything?

data.name: 0011 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: When I told them I'd left something in the music room...

data.name: 0012 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ...they said--"if you need the key, it's on the wall over there. Go ahead and take it."

data.name: 0013 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hahh... That's it? That's a bit of a letdown.

data.name: 0014 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On the other hand, I'm not sure it'd have gone so smoothly if it were me or Haruhi.

data.name: 0015 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In that sense, I feel like this was the right choice for this job.

data.name: 0016 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For now, shall we go deliver this key to Haruhi?

data.name: 0019 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, what are you looking at?

data.name: 0020 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato was staring motionlessly at a poster on the bulletin board about a...

data.name: 0021 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...music composition contest.

data.name: 0023 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wow, there are contests like this?

data.name: 0024 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I had absolutely no idea.

data.name: 0025 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No one's would notice it since it's posted up in the staff room…

data.name: 0026 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A composition contest, huh...

data.name: 0027 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? What if there was someone who was practicing overtime for the sake of...

data.name: 0028 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...this contest?

data.name: 0029 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh? Someone like that exists?

data.name: 0030 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No, I'm just saying, what if there was someone like that?

data.name: 0031 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm talking about that music room ghost story.

data.name: 0032 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah! I see what you mean!

data.name: 0033 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I suppose it wouldn't be strange if there was a student who was borrowing the piano...

data.name: 0034 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ...in the music room for the contest.

data.name: 0035 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If that's enough to get Haruhi to call off this ridiculous investigation...

data.name: 0036 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then I'll steal at least on of these posters and run away with it.

data.name: 0037 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-we should ask the teacher if we can take one of them...

data.name: 0038 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? Nagato, what are you doing?

data.name: 0039 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, Kyon, here…

data.name: 0040 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato pointing at a sign with the contest sign-up deadline written on it.

data.name: 0041 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's up with that? The deadline date is from last month isn't it?

data.name: 0042 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I think if you ask for one they'll give it to you easily though…

data.name: 0043 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Considering this date, I'm not sure we really can trick Haruhi with it.

data.name: 0044 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Alright, let's take this poster.

data.name: 0045 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But what are you going to do about the deadline?

data.name: 0046 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's give up on the poster idea.

data.name: 0047 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi would definitely notice the deadline has long passed.

data.name: 0048 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's right…

data.name: 0049 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, we have no reason to hang around any longer.

data.name: 0050 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's get out of here before we start attracting attention.

data.name: 0053 (411.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ah, Kyon, welcome ba--

data.name: 0054 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Have you been behaving properly?

data.name: 0055 (411.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: A teacher asked me who I was, so I said I'm Kyon's little sister.

data.name: 0056 (411.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: They told me to do my best and gave me a sweet.

data.name: 0057 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn, which teacher was it? What's "do your best" supposed to mean?

data.name: 0059 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Suzumiya should be in the library, right?

data.name: 0060 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We've got no reason to rush. Let's take our time on the way back.

data.name: 0061 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While we walk I need to think of a way to get Haruhi to call off this summer camp.

data.name: 0062 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On top of that, I suppose you could say having the chance to talk to Asahina...

data.name: 0063 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...or Nagato without Haruhi or Koizumi butting in is worth making the most of.

data.name: 0065 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Hey hey! Mikuru and Kyon!

data.name: 0066 (411.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Oh, it's Tsuruya!

data.name: 0067 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Oh wow, Nagato and little sis are with you as well, huh?!

data.name: 0068 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Isn't it great that you all get along so well, huh?! You look like you're having fun, right?!

data.name: 0069 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You too, Tsuruya--you seem as lively as ever.

data.name: 0070 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Lively as lively can be--!

data.name: 0071 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I have this feeling something fun's gonna happen, you know!

data.name: 0072 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Does she just have good intuition or does she know something…

data.name: 0073 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Tsuruya's words always spook me a little.

data.name: 0074 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Besides, Kyon, haven't you got some pretty flowers for each arm!

data.name: 0075 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Aren't you a smooth operator~

data.name: 0076 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Flowers? I don't have any flowers on me?

data.name: 0077 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I see I see, so you charm the flowers with that relaxed attitude of yours?

data.name: 0079 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ts-Tsuruya--! It's not like that--

data.name: 0081 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kya--

data.name: 0084 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm not sure what she was thinking, but she all of a sudden embraced Asahina.

data.name: 0085 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Nyahahaha! Mikuru, you really are so adorable.

data.name: 0086 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ts-Tsuruya... I can't breathe...

data.name: 0087 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: How about you, Kyon?

data.name: 0088 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Don't you just wanna take her home right away--?!

data.name: 0089 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's not like…

data.name: 0090 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you say something like that, it only makes it difficult to find the right way to respond...

data.name: 0091 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On the other hand, these good-looking girls embracing each other is a sight for sore eyes.

data.name: 0092 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I should appreciate this as much as I can while I have the chance.

data.name: 0096 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hey…

data.name: 0097 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina escaped Tsuruya's embrace as her cheeks were getting a little red.

data.name: 0098 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Oh dear, you got away.

data.name: 0099 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wanted to watch that a little longer. ...It's a bit of a shame.

data.name: 0101 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Kyon, which do you prefer--a flower that's beautiful even at a glimpse, or...

data.name: 0102 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: ...a flower that blooms at the edge of a road?

data.name: 0103 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What sort of a question is that?

data.name: 0104 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Well let's see, as for the pretty flower...

data.name: 0105 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: They're pretty, lovely and before you realize it, they make you want to look after them.

data.name: 0106 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Flowers that bloom on the roadside are small, don't stand out, but you feel proud of them.

data.name: 0107 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like I said--what are you on about?

data.name: 0108 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Just pick! Which is it!

data.name: 0109 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If I were decorating my room with it, I guess the pretty flower.

data.name: 0110 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Oh my my! I knew it~ I see, I see~

data.name: 0111 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Y'know!

data.name: 0112 (411.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-um, we should decorate the clubroom with flowers sometime.

data.name: 0113 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Y-yeah, that would be nice, right?

data.name: 0114 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What in the world is she talking about?

data.name: 0116 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I suppose even flowers that bloom on the roadside have a nice elegance to them.

data.name: 0117 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Kyon, such a refined taste~

data.name: 0118 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Isn't that right?

data.name: 0119 (411.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Use this.

data.name: 0120 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What Nagato handed over was a bookmark with a pressed flower on it.

data.name: 0121 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A-ah, thanks.

data.name: 0123 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why is Nagato giving me a pressed flower now considering what we were just talking about?

data.name: 0124 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This girl talk thing might as well be an alien language to me…

data.name: 0126 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Though, Kyon, you've got quite the long face for someone with a flower in both arms?

data.name: 0127 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm just worried about something.

data.name: 0128 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Ahh, worries--isn't that lovely~ What it's like to be youthful~

data.name: 0129 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Speaking as the person with the worries--it doesn't feel so lovely to me.

data.name: 0130 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Then let big sis give you some advice, okay, Kyon?

data.name: 0131 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: You mustn't hide your worries in an attempt to please others.

data.name: 0132 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: You have to find the root of those worries and cut them off!

data.name: 0133 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Cut them from the root, you say?

data.name: 0134 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The root of this situation…

data.name: 0135 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe even without getting in the music room, the problem still won't be dealt with.

data.name: 0136 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Didn't you have business in the library?

data.name: 0137 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh yeah, that's right.

data.name: 0138 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Well we've arrived at the library now.

data.name: 0139 (411.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha... Since when did we...?

data.name: 0140 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seems like we got here while we were talking.

data.name: 0141 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Well then, Kyon, give it your best effort out there!

data.name: 0142 (411.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: You too, Mikuru, do your best--! See ya!

data.name: 0143 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Tsuruya headed off.

data.name: 0144 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, she left me with some important advice.

data.name: 0145 (411.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Cut it off from the source, huh. Should be worth a shot at least.

data.name: 0146 (411.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Take the poster

data.name: 0147 (411.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Give up on the poster plan

data.name: 0148 (411.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Beautiful flower

data.name: 0149 (411.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Flower that blooms on the roadside
